channel.title: transformation on Learning is a lifelong journey, best traveled with an open mind and a curious heart.

item.title: Winning... by Failing?
item.description: How adopting a fail fast, fail often, fail smarter approach can lead to success in innovation and transformation “Failure is Awesome; I love to Fail!” said no one EVER! When we think of failure it conjures up a range of emotions from inadequacy, worthlessness to why try as I am never going to succeed. This type of self-critical talk is not right for anyone and do you know what, everyone fails (more often than we realise).
